overview: Mr. Russo has 30 years experience in high-tech industry. Mr. Russo is an accomplished senior executive with over 30 years experience in a variety of business environments. He has functional experience in operations management, sales, marketing, product development, and information systems technology. He has led organizations through start-ups, turnarounds, explosive growth periods, mergers, and divestitures. Senior executive experience includes: President of Enterprise Channel Division, Nortel Networks, President Automotive Safety products SBU Allied Signal Inc., and V.P. of World-Wide Operations, Apple Computer Inc.
